forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Lows overnight in the low 60s.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 20C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low around 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 70F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 21C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Thunder possible. Low near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Thunder possible. Low around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 70F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 21C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early with showers developing later at night. Low 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early with showers developing later at night. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 68F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High around 20C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Thunder possible. Low 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Thunder possible. Low 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
